ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 8 years. Currently this candidate is employed as a VMware Consultant at GDIT. This candidate has extensive knowledge of VMware, HP Hardware, Microsoft Exchange 2003, SAN, Dynamic Host Control protocol, Active Directory, Dell Server Hardware, Data Centre, Windows 2008R2, RAID, PC Hardware, Network Attached Storage, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, LAN/WAN > VLAN, VPN, TCP/IP, Network File System, Microsoft Exchange Server, LAN/WAN, IBM Hardware, Content Filtering, UNIX, SQL Query Analyzer, Network Appliance, Microsoft Exchange 2010, LAN/WAN > LAN, FTP, Domain Name Server Protocol, Cisco Switches/Routers, iStore SAN, Web Server, Veritas Cluster, Secure Shell, SNMP, Microsoft Transact-SQL, Linux, ISP, Hitachi Hardware, Dell PowerEdge Servers. So far this candidate has not gained any managerial experience.
